1.content:
From what I can tell from Catalyst, the only time Faith has ever changed her clothes was in prison, meaning that underneath those shoes are some serious biological weapons, so...

Why is the infamous runner going to kill your brain cells with her nasty stink?

A) you're a fellow runner who lost a race with Faith. "Shouldn't have made that bet, my feet can't wait to meet your face". This is non-willing as you'll be sniffing her feet not because you want to... But a bets a bet.

B) You haven't been with Ksec long, but when you saw one of the most wanted girls in the city, you though it would be an easy promotion. "I seriously hope you have a foot fetish, cause I'm going to fry your brain with these bad boys"

C) you hired Faith for a "special" job, but you just couldn't believe it when she showed up, apologizing for being covered in sweat after running all day. You then carefully explained you foot fetish and that the job you had wasn't about running. "So I get to sit down, relax and make you sniff my feet? Win."
1.title: Why would Faith have you sniff her feet?

choices: A bet's a bet, sniff those funky toes.
You can't take it! Gag on her stink.
11.content:
"Almost had me" Faith said as you both returned to the loft at the HQ.

"Really?" You asked, recalling being behind Faith the entire time.

"Push, no. But you'll find I enjoy to play with my foot toys" Faith said with a seductive tone.

"Oh really!?" You laughed back at her

"You're the one who made the bet" Faith said with her hands in the air.
"Speaking of which, how 'bout you come make good on that?"

Faith taunted as she walked over to a small love seat, sliding down into the chair and propping her feet up on top of a footrest.

Following faith, you reluctantly sat on the floor in front of her feet, mentally preparing yourself.

"I almost feel bad, I can't remember the last time I took the stink traps off"
Said Faith, easily undoing you mental preparation as she kicked off her fucking rancid shoes and wrapped her long, slender toes around your nose as a stink comparable to blue cheese in the sun assaulted your nostrils. Her feet were covered in thick layers of sweat and grime which she gleefully rubbed across your face. with the ball of her foot pressed into your upper lip and her toes arched over your nose, she was like a spider who had you caught in in her smelly web.

"Well go on, footboy, take a big whiff.."
11.title: The Rancid Smell of Defeet

choices: Listen like a good little footsniffer
112.content:
Faith wiggled her nasty toes in your face as you recoiled back to cough

"That bad huh?
She asked mockingly.

"Hmm, that a shame, cause you'll be smelling them aaalll night long. But you did give me an idea"

Said Faith as she got up and walked over to a couch, leaving a new, sweaty footprint on the floor with every step. "Come here" she ordered.

You followed Faith to the couch and she instructed you to lay on your back with your head against the back of the couch. Faith proceeded to lay down on top of you with her head by your feet and her two stink factories swinging back to your face. "That's better" Faith said as her sole pressed up against your lips and your nose dug in right under her malodorous toes.

"Now I can have you sniffing me all night long and there'll be no getting away".

Faith was right
You were now pinned beneath her. You could easily push her off if you tried, but you wouldn't break a bet.

You were stuck beneath her
No matter how much you instinctively tried to move your head, she'd have you at her feet the whole night through
With your nose in her ripe toes
Sniffing her feet for her enjoyment.

"Now that I've got you where I want you...."
Faith said , grinding her smelly toes against your nose, imprinting her stink on your face. "Take a big sniff"
112.title: You can't take it! Gag on her stink.

choices: "hey, that felt nice. Sniff up all my toejam, now."
1121.content:
Faith let out a sigh of relief as she felt the cooling sensation of your nose vacuuming up her horrid foot stench.

"Again" she said, looking at you while she wiggled her toes. Faith wanted to see you at the mercy of her rancid feet.

You drew in another deep breath from her sweaty toes, immediately choking and sputtering on her foul feet. Faith giggled.

"Again"
Faith repositioned her foot, catching your nose between her big and second toe, trapping your nose in the smelliest part of her foot. You took a big whiff from between her toes, pulling in the toxic air from the most foul part of her toes and once again gagging.

Faith slid her foot gently across you face making room to cram both of her disgusting feet against your face, using all 10 toes to form an arch over your nose.

"Again" she whispered, clearly enjoying this more than she should.

"We should really do this more often, with me on top of you while you helplessly sniff my gross tootsies."
Said Faith
"Just say the word and I can kick off my shoes whenever you want another go" she said sarcastically.

Not wanting to break the bet, you kept on sniffing at Faith's wiggling toes.
Faith was clearly enjoying you being completely at her mercy, amusing her very stinky will.

Obeying your new "mistress" you took another, deep breath, sucking up the stench directly from her nasty toes.

"That's a good boy" Faith yeasted "don't you dare stop sniffing my little stink machines"

And so you didn't. You just took sniff after sniff after sniff. Faith's toes girled around your nose as she was gitty with glee. You figured she must of had some sort of foot fetish and you regrettably though back on the bet.

"So if I win, we spend the night together?" You recalled asking gleefully.

"Don't get your hopes up" Faith replied.
"WHEN I win, you have to spend the night smelling my feet" and then she taunted you all the way to the finish line.


You had a long night ahead of you as Faith showed no signs of letting up any time soon. The sun had only just begun to set and Faith had her vinegary, cheesey feet plastered up against your face.

You had forgotten was fresh air was like as you sniffed up more of Faith's foot fumes, burning your nostrils, that didn't stop you though as you drew in another whiff of her gag inducing toe cheese.

Your face was covered in Faith's footsweat as her nasty peds dripped all over you, letting her stench cling to your face as well.

"Tell me, how does it smell?"

Asked Faith, pressing her toes even harder into your nose.

"Does it make you want to cry?"

You nodded, streaking your nose up and down her feet.

"Sniff harder then"

And so you did, taking in another deep breath and in the process of fumigating your nose, you accidentally inhale some of the gunk from between her sweaty toes, immediately coughing.
1121.title: Listen like a good little footsniffer

choices: Try and please Faith and sniff the stink from between her toes
Try and turn your head to get a quick breather
13.content:
The runner girl sat on on your stomach, absolutely covered in in sweat from head to toe. Faith had her shoes her shoes on either side of your head, teasing you with the sound of her toes wiggling around in her tight little shoes.

"Are you sure you want to smell my feet? Last chance to back out, I've been wearing these shoes for god knows how long"
She said in a successful attempt to tease you.
"Just think about how sweaty my feet are, trapped in the same shoes every day with no socks, not eve-"

"I'm sure" you interrupted, not being able to take the teasing.

Faith's eyes beamed down to yours, a sly smile forming across her face.
"Oh I'm going to drown your nose in my stink"

Faith easily slid out of her ghastly shoes, without warning, she pressed both balls of her feet directly under your nose, pressing her toes down to hold your nose under the smelliest part of her foot.

"Sniff 'em"

Faith said, her grin growing to show teeth.

The runner's swampy feet caked your face in her sweat, the heat of her feet practically cooking your face. You took a deep sniff from between her toes, her stuffy feet immediately overpowering you.

Coughing and choking on her stink, no matter how much you like it, you needed a quick breather. You went to grab her ankles and lift her feet, but Faith quickly grabbed your wrists and pinned them to the ground

"There's no backing out"
Faith said, rubbing the balls of her feet against your nostrils, grinding her overpowering stink into your nose.
"I ran all the way across the city so you could ask to smell my feet, so your going to spend the day under my feet. Now sniff"

As hard as it was to breath in her stink, you were in pure ecstasy and did as you were told. Inhaling the rancid stink from between her toes, immediately choking on her foul stink.

Faith simply groped your nose with her toes, enjoying the sensation of your cooling sniffs from between her toes.

"That's right, gag on those feet little footsniffer"
13.title: Faith's New Favourite Toy

info.brief_description: Time to sniff some seriously nasty feet.
info.description:
Here are the rules:

- This is a footsmelling story, please keep to sniffing only.

- You will only be smelling Faith's feet

- Please don't break the fourth wall, no ~whoah I'm in Mirror's Edge '0'~
